original_text: You did not bring sheep to me as burnt offerings. You did not make sacrifices to me, to show that you respect me. I did not make it difficult for you, when I asked you to bring offerings to me. When I asked you to burn incense to worship me, that should not have made you tired. You did not bring sheep to me as burnt offerings. You did not make sacrifices to me, to show that you respect me. I did not make it difficult for you, when I asked you to bring offerings to me. When I asked you to burn incense to worship me, that should not have made you tired. You did not bring sheep to me as burnt offerings.
korean_text: 네 번제의 양을 내게로 가져오지 아니하였고 네 제물로 나를 공경하지 아니하였느니라 나는 제물로 말미암아 너를 수고롭게 하지 아니하였고 유향으로 말미암아 너를 괴롭게 하지 아니하였거늘

sentences.original_text: You did not bring sheep to me as burnt offerings.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게 번제물로 양을 가져오지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: You did not make sacrifices to me
to show that you respect me.
I did not make it difficult for you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 위해 어렵게 만들지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: when I asked you to bring offerings to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 나에게 제물을 가져오라고 요청했을 때.

sentences.original_text: When I asked you to burn incense to worship me
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 나를 경배하기 위해 향을 피우라고 요청했을 때,

sentences.original_text: that should not have made you tired.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너를 피곤하게 만들지 않았어야 했다.

sentences.original_text: You did not bring sheep to me as burnt offerings.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게 번제물로 양을 가져오지 않았다.
